title: 1100 12 "Powers on a Different Level! Luffy vs. Lucci!"Transliteration: "I Jigen no Chikara! Rufi tai Rutchi!" (Japanese:異次元の力！ルフィVSルッチ！) Nozomu Shishido Atsuhiro Tomioka Keita Saitō, Kimitaka Itō& Hiroyasu Oda April 7, 2024(2024-04-07) 3.0%[17]
transformers_text:
1100 12 "Powers on a Different Level! Luffy vs. Lucci!"Transliteration: "I Jigen no Chikara! Rufi tai Rutchi!" (Japanese:異次元の力！ルフィVSルッチ！) Nozomu Shishido Atsuhiro Tomioka Keita Saitō, Kimitaka Itō& Hiroyasu Oda April 7, 2024(2024-04-07) 3.0%[17]

Sakazuki learns that the Straw Hats are on Egghead and are aligning with Vegapunk. He sends Kizaru to support Lucci and the CP0 agents. Despite being given orders, Lucci disobeys and battles Luffy. They both transform into their awakened forms. Vegapunk explains the uniqueness of Luffy's Devil Fruit, linking it to Nika, the Sun God. Sentomaru arrives and aids Luffy with the help of the Seraphims, but he ends up being knocked out by Lucci's attack.
